shortBio.intro: B.Tech CS student at NIT Patna passionate about building full stack applications with a focus on user-friendly interfaces. Skilled in MERN Stack.

aboutBio.full: Computer Science student at NIT Patna passionate about full stack development with a strong foundation in Data Structures & Algorithms. I approach technical challenges analytically and continually expand my skills in GenAI and modern web technologies. As a Robotics Club member, I've organized workshops and led teams building combat and soccer bots. Outside coding, I enjoy competitive programming and sports, having won Bronze in 50m Hurdles at NIT Patna Intramurals.

education.title: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.description: Organized and facilitated 3+ workshops on designing and building robotic bots. Led a team of 4 to build a combat-ready battle bot, achieving 4th place among 15+ teams at NIT Patna's tech fest. Directed a team of 3 in designing and developing a soccer bot for the annual tech fest, enhancing hands-on robotics and teamwork skills.

Led teams in 4 major hackathons, including the prestigious Smart India Hackathon. Guided my team to qualify at the internal NIT Patna hackathon and advance to the national level. Oversaw all phases from ideation to development and presentation, ensuring effective collaboration and timely delivery of innovative solutions.

achievements.title: Winner - Model United Nations
achievements.description: Represented the Republic of Poland at NIT Patna's Model United Nations. Earned the Best Delegate award for exceptional debate skills and impactful resolutions.

achievements.title: Technical Member
achievements.description: Active member of the Robotics Club, led team building combat and soccer bots, organized workshops.

achievements.title: Class Representative
achievements.description: Coordinated between faculty and students, organized department events.

achievements.title: Bronze Medal - NIT Patna Intramurals
achievements.description: Won Bronze in 50m Hurdles at the university sports event.

certifications.title: Data Structures & Algorithms

leetcode.name: LeetCode

projects.title: BookHive
projects.description: BookNest is a full-stack library management system with distinct user and admin roles. It features book and PYQ management, a borrowing system, OTP-verified authentication, and separate dashboards. Built with React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack library management system with user/admin roles, book management, and secure authentication.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal developer portfolio showcasing projects and skills. Designed and built a responsive single-page portfolio with smooth animations and dynamic navigation. Integrated a contact form using EmailJS and added a downloadable resume feature.
projects.shortDescription: Responsive developer portfolio with smooth animations, dynamic navigation, and integrated contact form.

projects.title: Stickify
projects.description: This is a simple notes application built with React and Vite. It allows users to create, update, delete, and manage notes with different colors. The application uses Appwrite as the backend service for managing notes.
projects.shortDescription: Simple notes app with color-coded organization, CRUD operations, and Appwrite backend integration.

projects.title: EcoGuardian
projects.description: An online community platform empowering individuals to collaborate on environmental projects, report cleanliness issues, access educational resources, and drive positive change for a cleaner, greener future. üåç
projects.shortDescription: Environmental community platform for project collaboration, issue reporting, and educational resources.

seoInfo.title: Yuvraj Mehta - Full Stack Developer | Portfolio
seoInfo.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern web technologies. Currently exploring Generative AI. Strong background in Data Structures and Algorithms.
